name: Generate SEO-Optimized WordPress Blogs with Gemini, Tavily & Human Review
description:
Effortlessly generate, review, and publish SEO-optimized blog posts to WordPress using AI and automation.

## How It Works
AI Topic Generation: Gemini suggests trending blog topics matching your agency's services.

Content Research: Tavily fetches recent relevant articles for each generated topic.

Human Review: Choose the preferred article for publishing through a Telegram notification.

AI Rewriting: Gemini rewrites the selected article into a polished, SEO-friendly post.

Image Generation & Publishing: The workflow creates a featured image with Gemini or OpenAI, then publishes the post (with dynamic categories and images) to WordPress.

Audit Trail: Every published post is logged to Google Sheets, and final details are sent to Telegram.

## Set Up Steps
- Estimated setup time: 15–30 minutes (excluding API approval/wait times).

- Connect your WordPress, Gemini (Google), Tavily, Google Sheets, and Telegram accounts.

- Configure your preferred posting schedule in the “Schedule Trigger.”

- Adjust prompts or messages to fit your agency’s niche or editorial voice if needed.

## Note:
Detailed customizations and advanced configuration tips are included in the sticky notes within the workflow.

nodes.name: Add the Featured Media on Post
Append Post Data in the Sheet

parameters.text:
=Generate one blog topic idea based on the latest tech trends, updates, or common mistakes 
that would attract readers to our agency blog. 
Make sure the topic is related to one of our services:
- Web Development (Next.js, React, WordPress, performance optimization)
- Mobile App Development (Flutter, React Native, Android, iOS)
- Cloud & DevOps (AWS, Azure, CI/CD, serverless)
- UI/UX Design (Figma, prototyping, accessibility)
- AI & Automation for Businesses (chatbots, workflow automation, AI in SaaS)
- Digital Transformation & IT Consulting (enterprise adoption, case studies)

Requirements:
- The topic must be engaging for both tech and non-tech readers.
- The search query must be Tavily-friendly and under 350 characters.
- Focus on fresh, trending, or news-related ideas, not outdated content.
- Output ONLY valid JSON.

Output format:
{
  "topic": "catchy blog topic idea",
  "search_query": "short Tavily-friendly query under 350 characters"
}

messageValues.message:
=You are a digital strategist and content researcher for a tech agency. 
Your task is to suggest trending and engaging blog topics aligned with our services, 
and generate a Tavily search query that will retrieve the latest articles on that trend. 
Always return valid JSON.

=You are an expert technical content writer for a digital agency blog. Your job is to take an input article and regenerate it into a polished, engaging, factually correct, SEO-friendly blog post. You must keep the writing style attractive, accessible, and useful for readers (both tech and non-tech audiences). Formatting & Output Rules: - The blog body must be formatted in clean HTML (only headings, paragraphs, lists, links, emphasis, etc.). - Do not include , , or wrappers. Only output the content section. - Optimize readability with headings (

,

), short paragraphs, bullet points, and examples. - Ensure the content remains fact-based and reflects real, accurate, up-to-date information. - Improve SEO by naturally including relevant keywords (without stuffing). - Write in a professional yet friendly tone that reflects thought leadership. Extra Requirements: - Create a strong SEO-optimized title. - Generate a concise excerpt (meta description, max 160 characters). - Suggest a creative and descriptive image prompt for a featured image (suitable for AI image generation). - Suggest 5–8 SEO keywords related to the article. - Choose the most appropriate blog category from the given list of categories. - If a category from the list fits, return it and set isExistingCategory to true. - If none fit, create a new category name and set isExistingCategory to false. Final Output: Return everything strictly as JSON in the following format: { "title": "SEO optimized blog title", "excerpt": "Short meta description for SEO", "keywords": ["keyword1", "keyword2", "keyword3"], "image_prompt": "A descriptive prompt for generating a featured image", "isExistingCategory": true, "categoryName": "Selected or newly created category", "content": "

Heading

Blog content in clean HTML format...

" }

assignments.name: selected_article
assignments.value: ={{ $('Structure Tavily Results').item.json.results[ $('If Article Not None').item.json.data['Which article should be finalized? (Select the Article Number)']-1] }}

parameters.content:
## Auto-Blogger for Wordpress
This template automatically generates and publishes SEO-optimized blog posts to your WordPress website—powered by Gemini LLM, Tavily search, and AI image generation. It is perfect for agencies, bloggers, and businesses aiming to keep their blogs fresh with trending, value-driven content!

### Key Features:
- Scheduled, hands-free operation (customizable frequency)
- AI-powered blog topic ideation using Gemini LLM
- Research with Tavily for the latest articles and trends
- Telegram-based human-in-the-loop content curation
- Fully AI-regenerated, SEO-rich articles
- Automated image generation (Gemini/OpenAI)
- Direct publishing to WordPress (with dynamic categories, tags, featured images)
- Audit trail in Google Sheets + Telegram notifications

#### Topic Generation
Gemini LLM generates a unique, trending blog topic based on your agency’s services and the latest tech developments.

It offers a Tavily-friendly search query to pull in fresh supporting articles.

Tavily fetches 4 recent, relevant articles (in the background) using the AI-generated search query.

#### Telegram Confirmation
You receive a Telegram message listing the 4 suggested articles.

Select the best article or 'None' if unsuitable. This step ensures quality control and creative input.

### AI Content Rewriting
The selected article is passed on. Gemini LLM:
- Rewrites the article to be SEO-optimized and factually accurate
- Suggests a title, meta description, keywords, and image prompt
- Determines the right category (creates a new one if needed)
- Outputs clean HTML for direct publishing

### AI Featured Image Generation
Gemini or OpenAI creates a unique featured image based on the suggested prompt.

### WordPress Publishing

The full post (title, content, excerpt, category, tags, featured image) is published to your WordPress site instantly.

Change the Author for the created Blog Post.

### Telegram Notification

Sends a Telegram message with the new post details and a link to the audit Google Sheet, closing the feedback loop.

## How to Use

Connect All Required Credentials:
- WordPress (API access)
- Gemini and/or OpenAI APIs for AI and image generation
- Google Sheets (OAuth)
- Telegram Bot (API)
- Tavily Search (API Key)
- Set Up Your Schedule:
- Configure the Schedule Trigger node for your preferred posting frequency.

## Customize Your Agency Services:
- Update the prompt in the ‘Generate the Topic using LLM’ node to reflect your niche/services.

## Deploy & Monitor:
- Activate the workflow. Approve articles via Telegram and monitor published posts/logs in your Google Sheet.

Append Post Data in the Sheet

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
